title: Crowberry (Empetrum nigrum)
name: crowberry
rationale: LightGBM provided the best quantitative performance. We removed the summer warmth and January minimum temperature covariates because of visible artifacts associated with the coarse resolution of those data.
description: The crowberry diagnostic species set consists only of Empetrum nigrum L. Empetrum nigrum is common and widespread throughout the map domain. Although we also included this species within the needleleaf ericaceous shrubs diagnostic species set, we mapped Empetrum nigrum independently to represent communities where it dominates or co-dominates, especially in the Aleutian-Kamchatka vegetation region.
